column3: Please squash the commits, and remove any @ username from the commit message (because that causes trouble).
The author is taking too long to respond to comments. Closing as "Up for grabs". Let me know if you want to start work on this again and I'll re-open.
Do you mind if I submit a PR for this?\nI have a refactored & commented version in my fork: [`317fb96`](https://github.com/Rjected/bitcoin/commit/317fb96de9c6257972f1213b4ef2c3fe87dde99f)
